body: The error “Unexpected identifier ‘assert’” is occurring because: 	1.	Node.js v22 removed support for “import assertions” in favor of “import attributes”. 	2.	The `@veramo/credential-ld` package or its dependencies likely uses the older “import assertions” syntax.  Here is a workaround Add the below lines to your package.json   },     "engines": {     "node": "20.0"   },
